abstract.t: This document specifies a "parametrized" CoAP Content-Format data item that allows supplementing a Content-Format with additional media type parameters. This document also defines two new CoAP Options, Parmetrized-Content- Format and Parametrized-Multi-Valued-Accept, that build upon the "parametrized" Content-Format data item to work around some of the limitations of the existing Accept and Content-Format Options.
